result.execSummary:
All charges against Terrence Bernard Eggson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Terrence Bernard Eggson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Terrence Bernard Eggson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson in court with attorney Lori Ann Kuehn.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State informs the Court their witness will not be available for trial.  State moves to dismiss this case.  Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson in court with attorney Lori Ann Kuehn.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. *Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of his client.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 7-1-22 at 9:30 am  for final pretrial and 7-25-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
All previous conditions of bail to remain.

Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson not in court.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Court received a phone call from the criminal courts customer service stating that Mr. Eggson was at the customer service window.  Court withdraws previously issued bench warrant and sets case for an inperson hearing.  Court reinstates all previous conditions of bail.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson not in court.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Status of Counsel held.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further orders that bail is forfeited.

Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson in court.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Preliminary Hearing.  Public defenders office has not appointed counsel at this time.  Court finds GOOD CAUSE to toll time limits.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Violent Contact Order.  Defendant to have no violent contact with ESH.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 04/23/2022 IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Terrence Bernard Eggson in court with attorney Jade K Hall.  Jennifer Jean Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch 10.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 4/21/22 @ 1p
